text: Dubreuillosaurus is a genus of carnivorous dinosaur from the middle Jurassic Period. It is a megalosaurid theropod closely related to Afrovenator and its fossils were found in France It looked a lot like Eustreptospondylus. The type fossil was an individual that probably measured long and weighed .Paul, G.S., 2010, The Princeton Field Guide to Dinosaurs, Princeton University Press p. 86 == References == == Other websites == * Dubreuillosaurus in the Dino Directory Category:Megalosauridae Category:Jurassic dinosaurs
title: Dubreuillosaurus
